name: Agent Hlina
summary: Agent Hlina is an adventure game from 1C. This is one of the first Russian projects where all characters are clay-made. Owing to this technology heroes and characters look very comical and thus the whole picture considerably differs from classically drawn quests. Though clay is a very attractive material, and there is a great tradition of clay-toons in Russia, game developers did not attempt to make a fuss-clay game for a long time. Modeling of clay creatures is a long and hard business, yet it looks quite simple on the face of it...
